title: Using social media to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics ...
summary: This post discusses using social media and survey data to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics in nature recreation. It highlights the limitations of survey data and compares it with social media data for understanding visitation patterns.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because it directly addresses 'spatial and temporal dynamics' and 'survey data', which are key aspects of the query, although it doesn't focus on point processes.
